YOU_CAN_ADD_BETS_TO_YOUR_BET_SLIP_BY_SEL: You can add bets to your bet slip by selecting their odds button
YOUR_BETSLIP_IS_CURRENTLY_EMPTY: Your bet slip is currently empty
SORRY_NO_INPLAY: Sorry, no inplay games to display
SORRY_NO_MARKETS: Sorry, no markets match this filter
NOT_OFFERED_FOR_EVENT: Cash out not offered for event.
NOT_OFFERED_FOR_MARKET: Cash out not offered for market.
NOT_OFFERED_INPLAY: Cash out not offered for inplay.
NOT_OFFERED_PREMATCH: Cash out not offered for prematch.
NOT_OFFERED_FOR_BET_TYPE: Cash out not offered for bet type.
SELECTION_SUSPENDED: Cannot cash out selection is suspended.
MARKET_SUSPENDED: Cannot cash out market is suspended.
EVENT_SUSPENDED: Cannot cash out event is suspended.
PRICE_COULD_NOT_BE_DETERMINED: Cannot cash out price could not be determined.
OVERASK_PENDING_INFO: Your bet is being referred to a trader
NO_EVENTS_OR_MARKETS_PRESENT: No events or markets presently available. Please check again later.
ACCOUNT_SUSPENDED: User has been excluded for short period of time
TIMEOUT: We were unable to place your bet(s). Please try again.
BETSLIP_FAILURE: We were unable to place your bet(s). Please try again.
BETSLIP_REJECTED: Unfortunately we were unable to place your bet(s). Please amend highlighted sections.
BET_LIMIT: Your attempted stake exceeds the bet limit. Please lower your bet stake or click on 'Max stake'.
STAKE_LIMIT: Your attempted stake exceeds the bet limit for this selection. Please lower your bet stake or click on 'Max stake'.
LIVE_SUSPENSION: One or more of your selections was suspended.
LIVE_ODDS_DECREASE: The odds of one or more of your selections have changed.
LIVE_ODDS_INCREASE: The odds of one or more of your selections have changed.
PRELIVE_ODDS_CHANGE: The odds of one or more of your selections have changed.
UNAVAILABLE_SELECTION: One or more of your selections is no longer available.
UNAVAILABLE_SELECTION_SINGLE_ITEM: This selection is no longer available.
MIN_STAKE: You have placed a bet with a stake below the minimum allowed
MAX_SELECTIONS: You have added the maximum amount of selections to the bet slip.
BONUS_VALIDATION: We were unable to place your bet. Please try again.
OVERASK_REFERRAL:
Your bet has been referred to a trader for a review.

You will be notified of the trader’s decision within a minute.
OVERASK_ACCEPT: Your bet was accepted following a trader review.
OVERASK_REJECT: Your bet could not be accepted following a trader review. Please try again using the ‘Max Stake’ button or by entering a lower stake manually.
OVERASK_COUNTEROFFER: Your bet could not be accepted following a trader review.
ASK_EXCEED_MAX_STAKE: To request a larger stake, increase the Stake value and click Place Bet. Your bet will then be referred to a trader
IOM_GAMBLING_COMMISION: The Isle of Man Gambling Commission
GAMBLING_RESPONSIBILITY_PARA1: We are committed to Responsible Gambling and have a number of self-help tools to help you manage your gambling.
GAMBLING_RESPONSIBILITY_PARA2: We also work with a number of independent charitable organisations who can offer help or answer any questions you may have.
LICENCED_AND_REGULATED_IOM: Licensed and regulated in the Isle of Man
REGULATIONS: Premier Bet is regulated by the Isle of Man Gambling Supervision Commission under a licence issued under the Online Gambling Regulation Act 2001 on 20th December 2011. All debts are enforceable in law on the Isle of Man.
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS: There are insufficient funds in your account.
ACCOUNT_CLOSED: We were unable to place your bet. Please try again.
PERMISSIONS_ERROR: We were unable to place your bet.
EXCLUDED_COUNTRY: Sorry, ‘Sports’ is not currently available in your country.
KYC_ERROR: To place bets, you need to confirm your email address. We’ve sent you a confirmation link; please check your email account. If your email address has changed, please update it in the Personal Details section and we’ll send you a new confirmation link.
SELF_EXCLUSION_ERROR: We were unable to place your bet because you are self-excluded from our site.
INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Please try later or refresh your betslip an unexpected error occurred.
REG_SEC_QUESTIONS: My Favourite Player,My First Car,Mother's Maiden Name,My First Pet's Name,My first School,Spouse's Middle Name
